ModMetaData.name: Degradation
ModMetaData.author: LimeTreeSnake
ModMetaData.description:
Do you want things to deteriorate with time and use? Vanilla Rimworld arbitrarily checks each day, each piece of apparel on each pawn, whether it should have it deteriorate by one point or not. However, this is not done for weapons and other carried items. This mod rectifies this amongst adding other features.
